channel.title: BUhealthAndWellness
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUhealthAndWellness, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: FDA Removes Black Box Warnings From HTR — A Landmark Moment For Women’s Health
item.description: The FDA has lifted black box warnings from hormone therapy—signaling a new, evidence-based era for menopause care.
